title: Whatever hysteria exists is inflamed by mystery
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block
    name=hysteria|
    caption=The only known photo of Dr Hysteria
]]
> hello i dr hysteria
> > [[[I hope you get back to me soon]]]
> written on 23/11/2014 for the [[[dystopia contest]]]
> wrote it on a whim without drafting
> would not recommend for first time authors
> > [[[SCP-1747|SCP-1747 rewrite]]]
> written on the 10/01/2015
> would like to revisit at some point
> > [[[SCP-2991|SCP-2991]]] 
> collaboration with [https://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/researcher-zyn-s-personnel-file Zyn]
> written on the 13/05/15
> extremely happy with result
> Zyn is a godhead
> she carried the article
> would also like to revisit
> > [[[SCP-694]]] 
> collaboration with Amuness Creeps and [https://www.scp-wiki.wikidot.com/researcher-voct-s-personnel-file Voct]
> written on the 22/09/15
> Amuness was a nice person
> Voct is another godhead
> ----
> now i am forever lurking
> see you soon

@@@@
@@@@
